original_text: Omri's son Ahab did many things that the Lord said were evil. He did more evil things than all the kings of Israel who lived before him.
korean_text: 오므리의 아들 아합이 그의 이전의 모든 사람보다 여호와 보시기에 악을 더욱 행하여

sentences.original_text: Omri's son Ahab did many things
sentences.korean_translation: 오므리의 아들 아합이 많은 일들을 행했는데

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were evil

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 많은 악한 일을 행했다

sentences.original_text: than all the kings of Israel
